caption.title: Cluster analysis of genes that were differentially expressed (4,620) between Wenzhou (WZ) and HK (HK) rhizomes.
caption.p: Red and green represent up- and down-regulated genes, respectively, in Wenzhou (WZ) rhizomes compared with those of Haikou (HK). The heatmap was produced based on fragments per kilobase per million (FPKM) data.
